headline: Blackstone (BX): Evaluating Valuation After Recent Share Price Slide and Long-Term Growth
summary: Blackstone (BX) has delivered some attention-worthy numbers lately, catching the eye of many investors. Despite some bumps over the past month, the company's annual revenue and net income growth rates stand out in the financial sector. See our latest analysis for Blackstone. After enjoying a strong run over the past several years, Blackstone’s share price has lost some momentum, falling nearly 14% in the last month and down 18.6% year-to-date. However, its long-term performance tells a...

headline: 2 Intriguing Stocks in the Portfolio of Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene
summary: If you have a look at Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene’s portfolio, you’d think that she’s quite the savvy investor, given the picks made in recent quarters. After taking a quick glance at the recent activity within the portfolio, I must say that I like her personal portfolio’s chances of doing well in the new year. ... 2 Intriguing Stocks in the Portfolio of Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene
